findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is declared as External and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: allow a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as external and does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected Direct Transfer in swap Function
findings.description: The swap function allows direct transfer of tokens without proper validation, potentially leading to loss of funds.

findings.title: Skim Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The skim function has been marked as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected sync Function
findings.description: The manualSync() function is publicly accessible and can be called by anyone, potentially causing unintended consequences.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is not protected and can be called multiple times, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Rebase
findings.description: Potential rebase functionality issue

findings.description: External call to addLiquidity function without proper validation

findings.title: Decrease Allowance Vulnerability
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function may be vulnerable to unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: manualSync

findings.title: setFeeReceivers
findings.description: The setFeeReceivers function has potential security risks due to its ability to modify fee receivers.

findings.title: setWhitelist
findings.description: The setWhitelist function has an access control issue as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: setBotBlacklist
findings.description: Smart contract owner can blacklist certain wallets from interacting with the contract function modules.
